TextAsset.value: Wait, I wanted to talk to someone…
Yeah, I just want out of here.
Don't associate with anyone...
Are you sure you don’t want to talk to anyone else?
JOIN AL IN THE LIBRARY
WHAT???
JOIN HIM IN THE LIBRARY
HUH???
${slot:playerName}, you’ve proven to be a greater nemesis than I could have ever imagined.
Nemesis?
Heh. Cagey to the end?
So be it.
I’ll be in the library.
Where we can end this little charade.
Um. Okay…?
I have no idea what you’re talking about?
You’ve won, ${slot:playerName}. Isn’t that enough?
Uh, will this make more or maybe ANY sense to me if we hang out in the library? ‘Cause I could make it.
Um. Yeah, it’s been fun but I think I’m done with this cops and robbers thing, Al. Sorry!
I repeat, Pineapple Flank Two is Condition Green.
Al, what is going on here?
THE MANTIS SHRIMP IS PRIMED! I NEED IMMEDIATE EVAC!
(I have no idea what that guy’s deal was...)
(He’s long gone…)
Want to come with?
Yeah!
Dirt's really boring...
Aki!
Hi ${slot:playerName}!
I know you're super busy and everything, but... Maybe we can hang out today!
Sure! Today I'm taking soil samples over on Zweihander Ridge.
Honestly... There's something I wanted to talk to you about, anyway.
Want to come with?
Yeah!
Great! Mind holding my notebook? I'll get the sample equipment.
Dirt's really boring...
Ask Mr. Driller.
Oh yeah... Hahahaha! I guess so. Well, let me know if you change your mind.
Did you change your mind?
Maybe...
Hey Aki!
Hey ${slot:playerName}...
(Oh, she looks puzzled.)
Everything ok?
Oh, yeah. It just seems I accidentally double-booked two clubs into the same time slot.
Oh, yikes!
And I misplaced something every important.
I've never done that before...
That's okay... It's normal!
Is that what I am? Just... Normal?
What's wrong with normal? Normal's fine.
Oh... Maybe it is...
(She seems a little strained these days... )
I see...
I better give you some space...
See you later... (BY WHICH I MEAN I DON'T TRUST YOU AND I'M TOTALLY GOING TO FOLLOW YOU)
Hey Anti-Bravoman! What's up?
Just sitting here... contemplating the gaping void....
Inside my own soul.....
(Sheesh. I better leave him alone.)
Hey Anti-Bravoman! Let's go to poetry club together.
I can't lie to you ${slot:playerName}. I'm not going to Poetry Club.
Oh... Where ARE you going?
Listen ${slot:playerName}... I really like you... You're like... So good... And I'm a void of terrible dark soul energy. You have to stay away. It's just better this way.
I see...
I better give you some space...
Thanks... Later....
I guess I'll just... Go for a walk...
See you later...
(BY WHICH I MEAN I DON'T TRUST YOU AND I'M TOTALLY GOING TO FOLLOW YOU)
Right... Later....
(I think he suspects I wasn't being entirely truthful... )
(I guess trust is a two-way street.)
(RUN AWAY!)
You don’t want to have anything to do with me, ${slot:playerName}…
R-right…
Meet me on the roof at OH-LATER-OH-CLOCK!
JOIN MAX ON THE ROOF
GIVE UP ON MAX
You're the only one I can turn to!
JOIN MAX ON THE ROOF
GIVE UP ON MAX
There’s gotta be something we can do.
There is.
Kinda.
But I’d need help.
Let’s hear it.
SECRET PROJECT SUPER PLANE.
The specs are divided into 48 separate homework assignments kept in various teacher lockboxes around Namco High.
What are you suggesting, Max?
A heist!
It’ll require a lot of planning though. We’d have to meet somewhere isolated and secure to discuss the details.
Sounds like the roof.
Th-the roof?!
OF THE SCHOOL?!?
But it’s so… it’s so…
...not on the ground.
Yeah, that’s where they put ‘em these days.
What’s the problem? Aren’t you a bird?
F-fine! Yes. It’s not like I’m scared. Who said I was!
Meet me on the roof at oh-later-o-clock.
(Never done a heist before! This could be fun! I never would’ve thought a nerdy little guy like Max would be up for one.)
Okay, I’m in!
(Y’know, I’m not doing Max any favors by helping him. He’s got to learn to stand on his own feet and tackle his problems head on!)
(Um, metaphorically anyway.)
I dunno. I’ll have to think about it.
Please, ${slot:playerName}?
You’re the only one I can turn to!
(Never done a heist before! This could be fun! I never would’ve thought a nerdy little guy like Max would be up for one.)
Okay, I’m in!
(Y’know, I’m not doing Max any favors by helping him. He’s got to learn to stand on his own feet and tackle his problems head on!)
(Um, metaphorically anyway.)
I dunno. I don’t think so, Max.
(He's scrambling over notes, I wonder what he's up to...)
AH! YOU DON'T HAVE CLEARANCE TO SEE DOCUMENTATION ON SUPER PROJECT SECRET PLANE!
I have no idea what you're even talking about!
And you never will!
Leave me alone.
I am pleasantly surprised you are all still here...
...but King wants me to remind you we are not surprised you’re still delinquents.
See you at the bell.
(Another day in the weirdest school and weirdest detention ever.)
(I wonder how the others are doing?)
(I’m not going to spend my time with any of these people.)
(They’re all obessed…)
(...with themselves, or with something that they think will save them.)
(They all keep missing what’s important. I can’t wait to get away from this environment.)
Nearly done with detention…
...I wonder if things will return to normal after it is over.
I just wanted to follow the rules and everything kept getting worse, though.
Maybe I'm not cut out for this ... and maybe I'm not worthy of the Katamari...
P-Pac-Man?
Be True to Yourself.
Wait, what do you mean? How is a simple platitude to help me now? Everything is the worst.
Be
TRUE
To
Yourself
Period.
Uh.. are you saying I should stick to my focus, follow the rules and…
Wait…
You’re right! I’ve been lying to myself all along. I don’t care about detention….
...OR these RULES.
My katamari and my rolling skills are the only thing I need!
I don’t need their help…
I don’t need ANYONE’S help!
When I get my katamari back… I’ll show everyone!
I’LL SHOW THEM ALL!
Ha Ha Ha…
HAHAHAHAHAHahahahaahaha!
Wait, maybe you’re like those bizarre exchange students…
...on second thought, maybe DON’T be true to yourself.
...and you're already gone. Well… I’m sure no harm will come of that. Yup.
Have a rooftop meal with Davesprite?
Yes!
Maybe there's someone less meta to have to deal with.
hey ${slot:playerName}
have you found any of those easter eggs on your own yet
maybe you can unlock the secret harem ending without my help
I decided a long time ago not to listen to your “game” nonsense, Davesprite.
Besides, even if this WERE a game, I’d be pretty sure you were just messing with me.
(I think?!?!)
(heh heh heh)
yo ${slot:playerName}
Hey man.
look i know this is all just a construct of the game and all
(SIGH).
but i still feel pretty dumb about how ive been acting
i shouldnt be a jerk to you
so maybe as an apology we can have a meal event on the roof
in true dating sim tradition
what do you say
Hmm, I dunno.
I don’t know as much about dating sim traditions as you, Davesprite.
I prefer going on real dates …
than going on pretend computer dates like you clearly do all the time!
haha cool a fourth-wall-breaking meta-burn
theres like three layers of “ouch” there
But…
Eating with you on the roof with you sounds pretty nice.
cmon lets do this
my hearts going dokidoki already
I have no idea what that means.
cool lets go
Commit to taking Donko on a date tonight?
Yes. I need to know how we feel about each other for sure.
I don't know yet... I need some time to think.
Hi there, honey!
Everybody’s talkin’ about you lately!
I’m, like, SUPER jealous.
I’d switch places with you in a second…
You and everyone else.
(There’s Donko.
After what happened the other day…
I can’t be sure of my feelings.
Is Donko just trying to flirt with me so I do what she wants?
Or does she have real feelings for me?
Well, I felt something real, at least…
So it’d be worth it to give Donko one more chance.)
Tee-hee! Hi there, honey!
Donko...
I bought two tickets for a concert tonight.
I guess they have live music at the cafe sometimes…
OMG! You sly dog!
Would, like, one of those tickets happen to be for moi?
(Do I want Donko to come with me?
I feel like going on a date will make my feelings clear, for sure…
But is it even worth the risk?)
I can’t help but notice you still have those two tickets, honey!
Yes, Donko…
I… I hope you’ll come with me.
I… I just...
Well, it would really mean a lot to me if you say yes.
OMG, ${slot:playerName}…
That is so, so super sweet of you.
I mean, like, jeez… Of course I say yes.
(I'm still not sure...)
Galaga Ship is really stressed out!
HELP GALAGA SHIP WITH A HUGE DRAMATIC GESTURE
DRAMA KIDS ARE TOO MUCH DRAMA
Galaga Ship is really stressed out!
BE A GOOD FRIEND.
THAT’S TOUGH
Galaga, you seem really stressed out… Maybe I can help out.
(I think the only way to get to the heart of a Drama student is to pull off a BIG TIME DRAMATIC GESTURE!)
(I should just let Galaga Ship sort its own problems out.)
I just don’t know what to do anymore…
(I think the only way to get to the heart of a Drama student is to pull off a BIG TIME DRAMATIC GESTURE!)
Me neither! It’s all complicated and unfair. We’ll figure something out though!
Dunno.
Good luck with it.
(Galaga really seems to be concentrating on that script...
probably best if I don't interrupt.)
Wish her luck?
I'd wish you luck, but you don't need it!
I wish I could make it... Good luck!
Hiromi...
Hmmm?
You ready for the race today?
Definitely.
I'd wish you luck... But you don't need it.
Heh. Thanks, kid.
(She seems pleased.)
I'm going, now.
(She seems fine, but... Maybe I'll give her some friendly support till she leaves for the race.)
I wish I could make it... Good luck!
Luck's got nothing to do with it.
Maybe I’ll come see the race after all…
……………………..Whatever you want.
Hey Hiromi!
Hey kid.
(I don't know why I tried to beat her at meaningful silence again. That will never work.)
Spend time having early dinner with Jane?
Yes!
Let's see who else is around first...
Hmm… King’s mask is very convincing.
It’s almost as if…
It were a REAL JAGUAR HEAD?!
Nonsense.
I was going to say “as if he had it custom-made.”
...I kind of envy your perspective.
It sounds a lot less stressful.
Helloooo, ${slot:playerName} :B
...You look like you’re up to something.
I am! But not to worry.
It’s nothing so dangerous as our other escapade.
I was just hoping you would join me on the roof for early dinner!
(Oh! That sounds pretty nice…)
What do you say? I’ve made something special for you! :B
Sure, Jane… I’d love to.
Um...I'll get back to you.
Meet Lolo at the cafe after detention?
Yes!
Let's see if anyone else has plans before we decide.
Hey, Lolo. Every time I walk into this detention room, you seem so down.
Why don’t you cheer up? They say forcing yourself to smile makes you happier.
Wow, you’re right. If only someone had told me that before.
Thank you ${slot:playerName}. You’re my hero.
Jeez, I’m just trying to help!
Hey, Lolo.
You know where the cafe is, don’t you?
Uh… yeah, I think so!
Cool. Meet me there after detention.
Or not. Whatever you want.
It’ll probably just end up being disappointing anyway.
Um… hello to you too?
So you’re coming to the cafe, right?
If you don’t, I’ll probably just sit there by myself.
I don’t mind being alone.
Boss… you want to go on a date with me?
Yes! Let’s go!
Let me think about it a minute.
Yes it is, Meowkie. Because the truth is... I like you.
Well... maybe... Only if you want it to be.
Spending time with someone so good could never be a waste.
Meowkie, I don’t understand why you say these things!
Hiya Boss! Nice day today, huh?
...Oh! And don’t forget I got my eye on you! No troublemaking, okay?
Haha, okay Meowkie.
(Wow, Meowkie looks totally crushed today…
Not that I blame her, of course.)
...Oh, heh, hiya Boss!
I didn’t see you right away…
I was thinkin’ about stuff.
Not hall monitor stuff! Other… stuff...
(Meowkie… you’re not fooling anybody.
I’ve got to cheer her up.)
It’s almost time to leave. Meowkie...
boy, this is hard to say...
Will you come to the cafe with me?
...On a date?
B-Boss...
I mean, ${slot:playerName}...
You’d really wanna go out with someone like me?
On a real date?
Y-yeah, of course Boss...
Let me know what you decide...
But as for me...
The answer’s, um, “yes”.
Of course I wanna go on a date with you, Meowkie!
Shall we say… we’ll meet at the cafe after detention?
...That sounds great.
See you there, Boss!
(Oh jeez, I’ve got butterflies in my stomach…
At least she seems distracted from that hall monitor stuff, though!)
Accept the invite?
Definitely!
Maybe I should check and see who else is around before I decide.
Hey ${slot:playerName}! How are you doing?
...Okay, I guess… things have been kinda weird lately.
You know what always makes me feel better when I feel weird?
Digging?
Actually I was gonna say a nice hot shower to clear the mind.
... after a long digging sesh
Hi, Mr.-
...Driller.
Why’d he have to just get up and leave like that?
Having your dreams crushed is no excuse to be rude…
Oh, weird, he left an envelope…
Addressed to me?
“Dear ${slot:playerName}, Please meet me for a bite at…”
Why didn't he just ASK me out?
Poor guy… he must be feeling pretty low…
I wonder if I should go with him.
Wha? I thought you left dramatically…
I was just checking to make sure you got my invite…
Yeah, I-
Hmm… maybe I should go…
If only to tell him how silly he’s acting.
Are you sure?
I'm sure.
You're bumming me out...
Hi Nidia... Want to hang out?
${slot:playerName}... We all have to be ready to face our destiny. Alone.
(You don't seem ready... So much as resigned... )
Nidia... Let's go to Magic Club one more time.
Are you sure?
I'm sure.
Okay.
You're a good person, ${slot:playerName}...
(I hope she's okay... )
You're bumming me out...
O-oh... Am I?
I'm sorry.
(Now she's just standing there quietly... Maybe I was too harsh.)
Are you sure you want to come to Magic Club? You don’t have to be nice to me…
Let Richard make it up to you?
Yeah, let's see what he's got!
I'm not sure about this...
Change your mind?
Let's do it!
Nope!
So are you ready to take time to smell the roses for once?
I...never thought of it like that before.
You’re right, ${slot:playerName}! I’ll make it up to you. I swear!
(I'm going to regret this, but...)
(...maybe I finally got through to him. Guess there's only one way to find out.)
I just don't know, Richard...
Change your mind?
I hope I don’t regret it, but yes.
No way.
Don't you see?! Everyone's in on it. Even you!
(Nope! Not going anywhere near that guy!)
Sit with Taira?
Sit with Taira.
Don't.
Yo Cuz! Come sit with me!
I need a test subject for my new Wrestleball move!
I call it… The Destroyer!
Uh… That’s okay.
Sniff…
(Taira… He still looks really upset from the other day.
...I guess I’m still upset too…
I can’t believe a friend of mine could really act that way.
But… I guess I do still consider him a friend…
I could at least try to talk to him…
I was really furious yesterday, but…
I know he’s not a monster…)
… Sniff…
(Taira…
He’s still a jerk…
But maybe I can talk some sense into him.)
Sure.
I don't know! It might not be worth the risk!
Go for a walk with Terezi after detention?
H1 COTTON C4NDY!
WHY DON’T YOU S1T W1TH M3 TOD4Y?
1 DON’T B1T3!
...You’ve got your fingers crossed behind your back, haven’t you.
DON’T B3 S1LLY!
TROLLS DON’T H4V3 F1NG3RS
W3 H4V3 3XTR3M3LY SH4RP CL4WS >:]
Yeah, I think I’m gonna sit next to someone else today.
H1 ${slot:playerName}
L1ST3N
1 KNOW YOU’R3 ST1LL UPS3T 4BOUT TH3 OTH3R D4Y
Why, because of your spooky troll Mind powers or whatever?
...NO
YOU’R3 JUST R34LLY OBV1OUS >:P
Oh.
WHY DON’T W3 T4K3 4 W4LK 4FT3R D3T3NT1ON TOD4Y?
1’D L1K3 1T 1F W3 GOT 4 CH4NC3 TO T4LK
JUST YOU 4ND M3
(She’s being surprisingly normal right now…
I guess it couldn’t hurt to give her a chance to explain.
Otherwise I might never know what her deal is!)
COM3 ON, PL34S3?
...Oh, alright.
H3H3H3, Y4Y <3
Help Tomari?
Don't let Tomari give up on inventing!
Leave Tomari to his own weird ideas.
Help Tomari??
Get Tomari out of his doldrums.
Leave him be.
Hey Tomari! Whoa, uh… you okay?
${slot:playerName}… hello. I’m just preparing for ten thousand years darkness. Ten thousand years… of personal darkness… for being a failure.
(I can’t let him mope around feeling sorry for himself. I gotta do something about it!)
(Man, all that stuff about robots and the age of darkness. That is NOT ${slot:playerName}’s scene.)
(Hrm. Poor Tomari. He must be pretty devastated.)
(I should try to shake him out of it!)
(Oh, well!)
The darkness is coming, ${slot:playerName}. You better start preparing for it...
Not that it will help.
(Well I guess I don't have to ask how he's doing.)
Spar with Valkyrie?
Sure?
No thanks...
We can tell each other secrets in the dark.
I'd like that.
Maybe secrets are secret for a reason...
I'm so restless... Want to spar? I need to pwn someone… work off this energy...
Sure?
Better not... You seem kinda delicate.
Dang... Where's Taira when you need him! Although hitting him would probably make him smarter... Which is probably dangerous too.
No thanks...
Probably for the best. I don't want to harm that cute face!
(G-Gosh!)
I need someone to spar.
Still want to hang out tonight?
Sure! We can tell each other secrets in the dark.
(Gulp.)
I've got all kinds of secrets!
Like crazy dark terrible secrets!
Hahaha! Uh-huh. Sure.
(She leaned against me... Gosh, we're so close like this.)
See you there, cutie.
(AHH IT'S A DATE OHMIGOD OHMIGOD! I just want the day to end, I can't wait to see her!!)
Maybe secrets are secret for a reason...
I didn't know you felt that way...
Um.
It takes a lot for me to...
IDK. Nevermind.
Maybe I'll see you around, huh?
Want to trade secrets?
